segment.target: Xyloph database access granted. There's nothing there...The data has been corrupted by a rhizomal virus.
Xyloph database access granted. The connection is bad...really bad, no doubt due to the massive magnetite cloud you're currently crossing.
Xyloph database access granted. Your screen is covered in greyish snow, it's giving you a headache, so you give up...
Xyloph database access granted. This disk contains a wealth of information on the Mush genome collected by Ian Soulton just before the departure of the Daedalus.
Xyloph database access granted. Some of Janice's research findings from Xyloph-17 are added to NERON's memory.
Xyloph database access granted. You have re-estabilshed contact with Nils Carlsson, whose help with your lab reseatch will be invaluable.

Xyloph database access granted. Zhong Chun is the only human who has proven to be immune to the Mush infection, and the analysis of her genome is the key to developing an anti-Mush vaccine as well as several other pieces of research.

Xyloph database access granted. You have established contact with Kivanç Terzi, who united a large part of the rebellion in the Sol system. His help will be vital in decoding messages from rebel bases.
Xyloph database access granted. You find a file containing dozens of recipes. Lots of recipes. Lots and lots of recipes.
Xyloph database access granted. You managed to get your hands on the Teaching centre archive from Xyloph! This intellectual treasure should help you educate your dumbwitted crewmates...

Xyloph database access granted. The anti-Mush research carried out by Finola was completed after the departure of the Daedalus. The findings were sent to the tabulatrix, and by reading them, you'll know the status of infection aboard the Daedalus from Day 1!
The document cannot be printed without a functioning tabulatrix...
The document cannot be recovered without a tabulatrix.
